subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Roger Clemens is a man who lives unapologetically large, who consumes attention the way his beloved Hummers guzzle gas, whose competitive ego was made for the kind of seductions the Yankees do best.
snippet: Roger Clemens is a man who lives unapologetically large, who consumes attention the way his beloved Hummers guzzle gas, whose competitive ego was made for the kind of seductions the Yankees do best.
